name: Oh Canada Grilled Salmon
description: Maple-glazed goodness with a punch of garlic to enjoy from coast to coast to coast. A sweet and sticky crowd-pleaser!
preparation: Combine first 2 ingredients in a re-sealable bag or bowl, add salmon and massage to evenly coat. Let stand in fridge for at least 10 minutes.
Grill or pan-fry over medium-low heat for 6 to 8 minutes per side, or until the fish flakes easily with a fork.
Serve with delicious prepared Mustard Glaze: Stir 1 tbsp mix in 1⁄2 cup honey mustard. Brush on salmon during last 10 minutes of cooking.
